info.description: A public API for customers to access Digital Fineprint's services.
info.title: API Gateway

post.description: Takes in some start data, sends it out to our data services for gathering, and returns an empty query with an ID to come back to.

get.description: Polls the current results for a given business query ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: UUID of business query to return

parameters.name: gathered_fields_only
parameters.description: changes output to fields that a this query id gathered only

riskIndicator.riskIndicator_title: Likely to provide advice or consultation
riskIndicator.riskIndicator_text: Based on their industry Investment and financial services, similar businesses tend to provide advice, services, or designs to clients.

get.description: By providing a name and postcode, you can search for matching businesses.

QueryRequest.description: Request to query for business details

timeout.description: Maximum time, in seconds, until the query is considered to be timed out.

blacklist.description: List of services that should be excluded from this query.

whitelist.description: List of services that are allowed to be used for this query. If not set, will allow all services (unless on blacklist).

max_depth.description: When resolving the requested data, this limits the maximum amount of steps that can be resolved as dependencies of each other.

business.description: DFP Business ID of the company

oldest.description: The oldest point in time to look for data (inclusive left boundary). Defaults to 1 month ago.

youngest.description: The youngest point in time to look fordata (inclusive right boundary).

immortals.description: Data keys that we consider immortal, so that they will always be returned however old they are.

isolated.description: Run an isolated query that will not use the cache or database to get existing data.

QueryResponse.description: Response from a query for business details

updated_at.description: When was this query last updated

state.description:
Current state of the query.
 * `WAITING` - At least one of the requested fields has no results yet.
 * `COMPLETE` - Found results for all of the requested fields.
 * `TIMEOUT` - The query reached the timeout before it found results
               for all of the requested fields.
 * `OVERRUN` - At least one more result came in after the timeout.
